sentences.sContent: I passed on my tentative conclusions to the police.
sentences.sCn: 我把我的初步结论递交给了警方。

sentences.sContent: The government is taking tentative steps towards tackling the country’s economic problems.
sentences.sCn: 政府正在采取临时性措施来解决国家的经济问题。

synos.tran: [试验]试验性的，暂定的；踌躇的

remMethod.val: tent(尝试) ＋ ative(具…性的) → 试探(性)的

trans.tranOther: not definite or certain, and may be changed later
